title: Tour de France stage 14: Rodríguez descends to headline victory, Pogačar and Vingegaard hit stalemate
content:
Pogačar and Vingegaard locked together in huge battle on Joux Plane climb and descent in crushing Alpine stage.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 14: Rodríguez descends to headline victory, Pogačar and Vingegaard hit stalemate on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
